alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 21 at 1:24PM MST until November 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Northerly wind gusting 20 to 30 mph, possibly increasing to around 40 mph Thursday night at the southern end of the mountain range. * WHERE...East Slope of the Wind River Mountains. * WHEN...5 AM Thanksgiving through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over South Pass, especially after about sunset Thanksgiving. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow and strongest wind is likely to occur from late Thanksgiving afternoon through about sunrise Friday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
